mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_chairs(n, preferences):
    leftSpaces = []
    rightSpaces = []
    for (left, right) in preferences:
        leftSpaces.append(left)
        rightSpaces.append(right)
    leftSpaces.sort()
    rightSpaces.sort()
    chairs = 1
    for i in range(n):
        chairs += 1
        chairs += max(leftSpaces[i], rightSpaces[i])
    return chairs

def calculate_minimum_chairs(n, preferences):
    leftSpaces = []
    rightSpaces = []
    for (left, right) in preferences:
        leftSpaces.append(left)
        rightSpaces.append(right)
    leftSpaces.sort()
    rightSpaces.sort()
    chairs = -1
    for i in range(n):
        chairs += 1
        chairs += max(leftSpaces[i], rightSpaces[i])
    return chairs

def calculate_minimum_chairs(n, preferences):
    leftSpaces = []
    rightSpaces = []
    for (left, right) in preferences:
        leftSpaces.append(left)
        rightSpaces.append(right)
    leftSpaces.sort()
    rightSpaces.sort()
    chairs = 0
    for i in range(n):
        chairs -= 1
        chairs += max(leftSpaces[i], rightSpaces[i])
    return chairs

def calculate_minimum_chairs(n, preferences):
    leftSpaces = []
    rightSpaces = []

def calculate_minimum_chairs(n, preferences):
    leftSpaces = []
    rightSpaces = []
    for (left, right) in preferences:
        leftSpaces.append(left)
        rightSpaces.append(right)
    leftSpaces.sort()
    rightSpaces.sort()
    chairs = 0
    for i in range(n):
        chairs += -1
        chairs += max(leftSpaces[i], rightSpaces[i])
    return chairs
